agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Property Tax TIME & DATE: 11:15 AM or upon adjournment/recess Wednesday, March 13, 2019 PLACE: Sen. Bettencourt's Desk, Senate Chamber CHAIR: Senator Paul Bettencourt The Committee will meet to consider pending business. SB 449 Creighton Relating to testimony by an appraisal district employee as to the value of real property in certain ad valorem tax appeals. SB 955 Bettencourt Relating to the matters that a taxing unit is entitled to challenge before an appraisal review board. SB 956 Bettencourt Relating to the correction of an ad valorem tax appraisal roll and related appraisal records. SB 1006 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to the exemption from ad valorem taxation of income-producing tangible personal property having a value of less than a certain amount. Public testimony was taken at previous hearings, no additional public testimony will be taken at this hearing.
